subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Miami Marlins pitcher Jarred Cosart has been fined by Major League Baseball for placing illegal bets, but M.L.B. said it found no evidence that he had bet on baseball.
snippet: Miami Marlins pitcher Jarred Cosart has been fined by Major League Baseball for placing illegal bets, but M.L.B. said it found no evidence that he had bet on baseball.
